title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS30072Course ContentsExternalities and Public Goods; Coase Theorem Vs. Pigouvian Solution, Pigouvian Taxes and Subsidies, Tradable Permits: Price Vs. Quantity Instruments, Mixed Instruments; Enforcement Issues; Environmental Regulation in India: Evolution of Environmental Policy in India; Air and Water Acts; Fiscal Incentives; Enforcement and Implementation Issues, Case Studies on Pollution Control in India and other Countries; Capital Theory Framework with Uncertainty, Risk and Irreversibility, Inter-temporal Efficiency, Intergenerational Equity; Distributive Issues: Intra and Intergenerational Equity, Poor and the Environment, Gender Issues and Access to Environmental Resources and Environmental Movements, Political Economy of Development; International Environmental Problems: Transboundary Pollution, Causes and Consequences of Ozone Depletion, Acid Rains, Global Warming, Rio Conference (Agenda 21); Protocols Relating to Climate Change; Trade and Environment Interaction, Case Studies.
